Source.name: EBS Sensor: FIN GL Journal Import Failed With Error EU02 While Running Consolidation - Monthly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: FIN GL Journal Import Failed With Error EU02 While Running Consolidation - Monthly
Source.Description: Identified the Duplicate data in the table gl_cons_segment_map for Consolidation ledger

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_FIN_GL_CONSOL_DUPLICATE_EU02' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'name:' || s.name || ', je_line_num:' || s.je_line_num || ', ledger_id:' || s.ledger_id || ', period_name:' || s.period_name || ', accounted_dr:' || s.accounted_dr || ', accounted_cr:' || s.accounted_cr key_data FROM (SELECT name name, je_line_num je_line_num, ledger_id ledger_id, period_name period_name, accounted_dr accounted_dr, accounted_cr accounted_cr FROM ( SELECT gjh.name name, gjl.je_line_num je_line_num, gjl.ledger_id ledger_id, gjl.period_name period_name, gjl.accounted_dr accounted_dr, gjl.accounted_cr accounted_cr, COUNT(*) OVER( PARTITION BY gjl.je_line_num, gjl.ledger_id, gjl.period_name, gjl.accounted_dr, gjl.accounted_cr ) c_count FROM apps.gl_je_lines gjl, apps.gl_ledgers gl, apps.gl_je_headers gjh WHERE 1 = 1 AND gjl.ledger_id = gl.ledger_id AND gl.consolidation_ledger_flag = 'Y' AND gjh.je_header_id = gjl.je_header_id AND gjh.default_effective_date > sysdate - 30 ) a WHERE a.c_count > 1 and rownum<1000 ORDER BY name) s
